title: Game Will Not Launch With New Client

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Game will not launch with this new client. It has caused me a few losses due to "Leaving" the game. I think this needs to be addressed, and Riot needs to return the LP to the people that this has effected. The new client has given me nothing but issues.

replies.body:
Have you confirmed this was an isolated issue with just the Beta Client, or have you experienced this issue on both clients? I haven't been informed of any bugs that would cause this issue, so this looks like a standard issue reaching our servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any network settings that could conflict with League.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.

It has only happened on the beta client. I sent in a bug report for it as well. It DOES NOT happen on the old client. I am forced to use the old one, as it happens every time I try to play with the new one.

Since this only happens on the Beta Client, I recommend using the Legacy Client for now.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
